dcterms:creator: Ching-Wei Chen
Paul Lamere
Markus Schedl
Hamed Zamani
dcterms:description: The Million Playlist Dataset (MPD) is a dataset designed for the task of automatic music playlist continuation, containing a large number of playlists and associated tracks.
dcterms:title: The Million Playlist Dataset (MPD)

dcterms:creator: Alessandro B. Melchiorre
Navid Rekabsaz
Emilia Parada-Cabaleiro
Stefan Brandl
Oleg Lesota
Markus Schedl
dcterms:description: Last-FM (LFM) is a dataset that includes user-track interaction data, which can be adapted for playlist continuation tasks despite not being explicitly designed for it.
dcterms:title: Last-FM (LFM)
